title: LAYA (Legal Aid at Your Access)
description: A Multilingual conversational AI for Philippine law, focused on data collection, NLP preprocessing, and model training for automated legal assistance.

title: iPaws
description: A comprehensive pet tracker app that enables you to connect with fellow pet owners, locate the nearest veterinary services, and monitor your pet's daily activities and needs.

title: NPK Deficiency Detector in Bitter Gourd Leaves
description: A Deep Learning CNN Model focused on distinguishing between Healthy, Nitrogen, Phosphorus and Potassium Deficient Bitter Gourd Plants.

title: Leaf It Up to Me
description: A web application designed to detect coffee leaf diseases using a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) based on MobileNetV2 architecture.

title: ArcadeHub
description: Your ultimate destination for pixel-perfect mini games. 3rd place winner of Base Build Hackathon 2025

title: AI-Powered Admission System - NU Lipa
description: A Django-based student admission system for NU Lipa, allowing student registration, admin management, and future ML integration for processing applications.

title: Peek-A-Book
description: Peek-A-Book is a small side project I built to experiment with computer vision. Take a photo of your bookshelf and the app will try to recognize the books, pull in useful details and suggest matches based on your reading preferences.
